content.description: Just a couple moves, really, but they pack a punch of quality and difficulty. One of the cooler problems in the whole Rock Shop area. Another steep granite line, this time on thin crimps you have to bear down on pretty hard.
content.location: Start on the low rail, down and right. Work up through a sequence that is easy to read once you've done it, but may be hard to stumble on the correct method at first. Reach out to lip, then rock over the top.

content.description:
This problem is the black to pink line on the Shade Surfer boulder.

This problem starts the same as happy hour, moves up and traverses right to the dish and overcome the bulge. Predicted v3.
content.location:
Shade Surfer Boulder

Walk Past The Lord of the Flies boulder to the Zef boulder. Once in front of the Zef boulder, scramble down to the left to a landing where the Shade Surfer boulder sits.

content.description: Great movement on big holds leads to a high crux, such as it is. Very good problem, one of the best of the grade.
content.location: Start sitting on the right side, and use some of the coolest jugs ever to get up to the top.

content.description:
This problem is the black and red line on the Shade Surfer boulder.

Start at the same point as Happy Hour but make a big move right and mantle.
content.location:
Shade Surfer Boulder

Walk Past The Lord of the Flies boulder to the Zef boulder. Once in front of the Zef boulder, scramble down to the left to a landing where the Shade Surfer boulder sits.

content.description:
Beautiful rock and amazing moves on this cool line. David Lloyd has a nice video on his site of this as well, so check that out.

It looks like from the video that a hold that they used is now gone (I think?), and we did it using slopier stuff. It felt to us closer to v6/+ than v5, so I took the liberty of upgrading.
content.location: You'll find this by finding Lord of the Flies, and then walking to the south, and then west into a kind of rock alcove. This line is the one on the right side of the wall, the arete.

content.description: Start low left on the same slot jug as Lord of the Flies. Climb up that problem, but instead of topping out straight up, continue following the fin/rail feature out right.
content.location: In the middle of the trail from the parking. Â Can't miss it.

content.description:
A clear line up nice granite, crux move at the top of the bulge, and a satisfying finish make this boulder a classic of the area.

This boulder is also the road marker to find your way up to Gem Thief/Starry Night.
content.protection: 2-3 pads would be nice. Can get away 1 big one maybe.
content.location: Walk away from the Car Park to the west, on the wide, flat trail. You should see this boulder after just a couple of minutes of walking. If you don't, you are going the wrong way.

content.description:
This problem is the black line on the Shade Surfer Boulder.

Start on the low flake to the right of the arete move up and left and top out.
content.location:
Shade Surfer Boulder

Walk Past The Lord of the Flies boulder to the Zef boulder. Once in front of the Zef boulder, scramble down to the left to a landing where the Shade Surfer boulder sits.

content.description:
This problem is the yellow line on the Shade Surfer Boulder.

Sit start on a big rail, high heel. Climb Straight up.
content.location:
Shade Surfer Boulder

Walk Past The Lord of the Flies boulder to the Zef boulder. Once in front of the Zef boulder, scramble down to the left to a landing where the Shade Surfer boulder sits.

climbs.name: The Conch
climbs.fa: We cleaned this up, but others have almost surely done it.

content.description:
Cool route on the butt of the Lord of the Flies boulder. A couple of easy moves gets the hips moving and ready for harder climbing.

The movement is good, but it's quite short, so I didn't give it more stars.
content.location: Low left end of the Lord of the Flies boulder.

content.description:
This problem is the blue line on the Shade Surfer boulder.

Start on Low flake move left then finish straight up the arete.
content.location:
Shade Surfer Boulder

Walk Past The Lord of the Flies boulder to the Zef boulder. Once in front of the Zef boulder, scramble down to the left to a landing where the Shade Surfer boulder sits.
